name: birds-of-zevenwacht
description: A collection of photos and sightings of various birds in Zevenwacht, Cape Town, South Africa

scripts.build: npm run build:css && cross-env ENVIRONMENT=development BASE_URL=http://localhost:8080 npx @11ty/eleventy
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:css && cross-env ENVIRONMENT=production BASE_URL=https://ndorfin.github.io/birds-of-zevenwacht npx @11ty/eleventy --pathprefix=birds-of-zevenwacht/

author: Shaun O'Connell <ndorfin@gmail.com>
